review: This movie is an anthology of four stories which is all beautifully directed by Karan Johan-'Ajeeb Dastaan Hai Yeh', Dibarkar Banerjee-'Star', Zoya Akhtar-'Sheila' & Anurag Kashyap-'Murabba'. All these four stories exceeds in winning the heart to those who do give it a chance even after watching the very first scene. Although this movie would've received much appreciation and collection if it would've released after 2020. Yet, love it.

" Achar ka dabbe me kabhi murabba nahi rakhna chaiye" this dialogue from this flim is also applicable for this movie. The 4 unique story have potential for better. Cast is suparb, but all of them is not justice with the role. This flim should release after 2020, feel audience will accept this flim better then.
